verses.name: Genesis 24:49
verses.text: And now if ye will deal kindly and truly with my master, tell me: and if not, tell me; that I may turn to the right hand, or to the left.

verses.name: Genesis 24:50
verses.text: Then Laban and Bethuel answered and said, The thing proceedeth from the Lord: we cannot speak unto thee bad or good.

verses.name: Genesis 24:51
verses.text: Behold, Rebekah is before thee, take her, and go, and let her be thy master’s son’s wife, as the Lord hath spoken.

verses.name: Genesis 24:52
verses.text: And it came to pass, that, when Abraham’s servant heard their words, he worshipped the Lord, bowing himself to the earth.
